body.head: Max Adler (born Vienna, Jan 15, 1873; died Vienna, June 28, 1937)

div.p: Viennese sociologist and socialist theoretician, also professor at Vienna University.

Like Otto Bauer, he was one of the theoreticians of Austro-Marxism. In his school of Neo-Kantianism, he attempted to combine the teaching of Karl Marx with the ideas of Kant, proposing a socialist model of life and culture, within which he coined the term "The New Man" ("homo futura" or "der neue Mensch").
